title: Which Episodes Are the Listeners’ Favorites? - The After Show
itunes:title: Which Episodes Are the Listeners’ Favorites? - The After Show
description:
There’s a website that allows listeners to vote for their favorite episode of a podcast. What does owltail.com say are our listeners favorite episodes?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
